channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Charlie Kirk had a message for the over 2 million unemployed Gen Z NEET men: You don’t need college to make your dreams happen
item.description: From dropout to multimillion-dollar nonprofit leader, Kirk claimed college was overrated—and many Gen Z share his skepticism.

item.title: Supreme Court Allows Trump to Fire F.T.C. Commissioner

item.title: Manhattan Will Not Get a Casino as Final Proposal Is Voted Down
item.description: The defeat of a plan to build a casino just south of the United Nations headquarters leaves five remaining proposals, all outside Manhattan.

item.title: Google faces antitrust déjà vu as US seeks to break up its digital advertising business
item.description: Google is facing another attempt to dismantle its internet empire in a trial focused on its abusive tactics in digital advertising.

item.title: Palestinians Hope Their State Will Be More Than ‘Ink on Paper’
Jimmy Kimmel’s Show to Return to ABC on Tuesday Night
item.description: The network’s removal of Mr. Kimmel’s show last week almost immediately morphed into a flashpoint for free speech in America.
